title: Heavy Division Sign

description: A large division symbol, as used in mathematics.
apple_vendor_description: The divide emoji on Apple devices is presented as a clean, mathematical symbol, typically a horizontal line with a dot above and a dot below. Rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and subtle 3D depth, it appears precise and easy to understand. This emoji is primarily used in mathematical contexts to represent division, or metaphorically to signify separation, splitting, or a clear distinction between two things.
